name: Ominous Wind
description: You stir up a gust of repulsive wind that strikes a creature in range. Make a ranged attack, dealing 1d10 + MOVE ghost damage on a hit. On a natural attack roll of 19 or 20, increase all of your ability scores by +1 while you remain in battle.
higherLevels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 2d8 at level 5, 5d4 at level 10, and 4d8 at level 17.
